prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan express romantic feelings for me either directly, or indirectly through metaphorical phrasing, between now and February 9th, 2025?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical list of the horary chart data for your question, based solely on horary principles:

1. General Chart Setup
 • Query: “Will Stefan express romantic feelings for me (Melissa Gale) either directly or indirectly (via metaphor) between now and February 9, 2025?”
 • Representation:
  – You are represented by the Ascendant (Melissa’s self)
  – Stefan is represented by his designated house—in this case, his 9th house. (A cross‐reference is provided so that when analyzing his influence, one may note that in your chart the house corresponding to his 9th is the one indicated by the guide.)

2. Key Planetary Positions (degrees and signs as given)
 • Sun: 15°11′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 24°47′ Aries
 • Mercury: 11°03′ Aquarius
 • Venus: 29°35′ Pisces
 • Mars (retrograde): 19°41′ Cancer
 • Jupiter (retrograde): 11°16′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 17°43′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°02′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°08′ Aquarius
 • North Node (retrograde): 29°42′ Pisces
 • Chiron: 19°35′ Aries
 • Ascendant: 25°57′ Gemini
 • Midheaven (MC): 0°12′ Pisces
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 0°12′ Virgo

3. House Boundaries (as provided)
 • 1st House starts at 25° Gemini (your Ascendant)
 • 2nd House starts at 19° Cancer (contains Mars)
 • 3rd House starts at 8° Leo
 • 4th House starts at 0° Virgo
 • 5th House starts at 3° Libra
 • 6th House starts at 19° Scorpio
 • 7th House starts at 25° Sagittarius
 • 8th House starts at 19° Capricorn (contains Pluto)
 • 9th House starts at 8° Aquarius (contains Sun and Mercury)
 • 10th House starts at 0° Pisces (contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node)
 • 11th House starts at 3° Aries (contains Moon and Chiron)
 • 12th House starts at 19° Taurus (contains Jupiter and Uranus)

Note: According to the cross‐reference guide provided, Stefan’s representation (his native 9th) aligns with the appropriate house in your chart. (For example, using the guide, Chart’s 6th House corresponds to Stefan’s 9th if that is the adopted system. However, you have indicated “Stefan by the 9th house (foreign connection)” so the key is to note the planets in the Chart’s 9th House—Sun and Mercury in Aquarius—and any aspects they make to your Ascendant or its ruler.)

4. Aspects and Degree Orbs
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • Midheaven (MC) opposition Imum Coeli (IC) (orb: 0°)
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 0°)
 • Moon sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 1°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 3°)
 • Neptune square Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • North Node square Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Venus square Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 4°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant sextile IC (orb: 5°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Moon square Mars (orb: 5°)
 • Moon conjunct Chiron (orb: 5°)
 • Ascendant trine MC (orb: 5°)
 • Chiron sextile Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Venus sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Moon sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Moon trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Uranus square IC (orb: 7°)
 • Uranus square MC (orb: 7°)

5. Chart Patterns and Special Features
 • T-Square: Involving MC in Pisces, Uranus in Taurus, and IC in Virgo
 • Multiple Planet Square: North Node in Pisces, Ascendant in Gemini, Neptune in Pisces, and Venus in Pisces
 • Yod: Involving IC in Virgo, North Node in Pisces, Pluto in Aquarius, and Venus in Pisces
 • Cradle: Involving MC in Pisces, IC in Virgo, Ascendant in Gemini, and Moon in Aries
 • The Moon is a waxing crescent
 • Bowl-shaped chart
 • Dominant element among inner planets: Air
 • Inner planets are exclusively in non-Earth signs
 • Dominant mode among inner planets: Mutable
 • Bottom right quadrant of the chart is empty
 • Majority of planets are situated in the top left quadrant
 • Jupiter is “rising” (positionally significant)
 • The IC is at the nadir
 • The Sextile aspect occurs most frequently (11 times)
 • Moon and Venus are involved in 10 aspects
 • Mutual reception is present between Moon (in Aries) and Mars (in Cancer)
 • Neptune in Pisces is in its rulership

This complete field of data—planetary positions, house placements, aspects with their orb details, chart patterns, and special features—is the foundation for a horary interpretation. All subsequent interpretations will draw solely on these data points.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the chart data, several key factors emerge regarding Stefan’s potential expression of romantic feelings:

• The focal point for his influence falls on the 9th house, where the Sun and Mercury in Aquarius indicate an emphasis on intellectual, sometimes unconventional communication. Their strong conjunction—and Mercury’s capacity for nuanced dialogue—suggest that any expression of interest may be veiled in metaphor and symbolic language rather than direct declaration.

• Your Ascendant in Gemini, ruled by Mercury, links you directly to this communicative energy. The Moon’s supportive sextile to your Ascendant adds an emotional readiness for subtle signals; however, tense aspects such as the North Node and Venus square your Ascendant hint at internal friction or external obstacles that could delay or complicate a straightforward exchange.

• The presence of Venus in Pisces (a sign rich in emotional idealism) forming conjunctions with both the North Node and Neptune underscores a karmic pull toward a dream-like, elusive form of romance. This suggests that if Stefan’s feelings emerge, they may be expressed in a delicate, indirect manner—using symbolic phrasing or allusions rather than overt statements.

• Noteworthy is Mars’ square to Chiron, which may point to unresolved hurts or hesitations. This aspect can signify that underlying wounds or fear of vulnerability might influence his approach, leading him to encapsulate his affections in indirect or carefully measured language.

• Additionally, supportive aspects such as Mercury trine Jupiter primarily brighten the communicative potential, providing an auspicious environment for messages to be shared. Yet, the overall pattern—featuring multiple squares and the T-square configuration—creates an inherent tension that suggests any romantic revelation may be both subtle and fraught with complexity.

In summary, the chart indicates the potential for Stefan to hint at his emotions indirectly, employing metaphorical or symbolic language rather than a clear verbal confession. The energies are present for an intellectual and somewhat esoteric expression of affection. The obstacles noted by the squares and challenging aspects imply that such communication might require time, personal healing, or a shift in circumstances before it manifests clearly.
